tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I recently visited Dr. Priyanka for the first time, needing a wisdom tooth extraction.  Admittedly, I was nervous  -  wisdom teeth are notorious, and mine was badly decayed!  However, Dr. Priyanka's expertise immediately put me at ease.

She clearly explained my options, recommending extraction due to the tooth's position and condition.  Despite the challenges, Dr. Priyanka skillfully extracted the tooth in one piece, minimizing discomfort.  I felt practically nothing, even after the anesthesia wore off!

This is a stark contrast to the horror stories I've heard about wisdom teeth. Dr. Priyanka's skill and gentle touch have completely eliminated my fear of dental extractions.

In fact, Dr. Priyanka is now my go-to dentist for all my dental needs, and I highly recommend her!
reply_text:
Hii Aasawari,
Thank you for your wonderful review! We're delighted to hear that Dr. Priyanka's expertise and gentle touch made your wisdom tooth extraction a positive experience. At our dental clinic, we strive to provide the best dental care and pain-free procedures. Your recommendation means a lot to us. If you need any further dental services, from cleanings to more complex procedures, Dr. Priyanka is here to help. Thank you for choosing us as your go-to dentist!
Cheers!

I was suffering regularly with gums infections for many years, I consulted couple of dentists in my neighborhood  but no benefit.  Finally I visited Dr. Shirodkar's Family Dental Clinic and explain my sufferings to Dr. Priyanka,  
she listened to my problems patiently and solved them skillfully in two visits
while treating doctor is very friendly and caring person, 
Thank you Dr. Priyanka and team for treating me well,  god bless you
Now 1 year over I don't have any major issues 
 
I highly recommend Dr. Shirodkar's Family Dental Clinic to my family & friends

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Priyanka explained the teeth cleaning, scaling and polishing in simple words, and put me at ease right at the beginning. She was continuously checking with me on whether I'm comfortable, if there's any sensitivity in any of the teeth, and guiding me through the steps. 

It put to rest any apprehension I had and I was very comfortable throughout the procedure. 

Post that she had mentioned sit at the desk and explained to me what I have to do on a day-to-day basis, in a good amount of detail, and confirmed that I've understood everything.

I was very happy with the tips given and professional yet friendly attitude she sported throughout.
reply_text:

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I recently visited Dr. Priyanka for tooth cleaning and consultation, and I have to say that I was thoroughly impressed with the experience. From start to finish, Dr. Priyanka and the entire staff were incredibly friendly, professional, and knowledgeable.

During my consultation, Dr. Priyanka took the time to listen to my concerns and answer all of my questions. She explained everything in a way that was easy to understand and made me feel completely at ease. I never felt rushed or pressured, which was a refreshing change from some other dentists I've seen in the past.

The tooth cleaning itself was also fantastic. The hygienist was very gentle and thorough, and my teeth felt so clean and fresh when I left the office. The whole process was quick and painless, and I really appreciated that they took the time to explain everything they were doing along the way.

Overall, I would highly recommend Dr. Priyanka and his team to anyone in need of dental care. They truly go above and beyond to provide top-notch service, and I'm so glad I found them. Thank you, Dr. Priyanka and team, for a wonderful experience!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Dr. Priyanka's dental clinic after reading Google reviews. 
For my excessive gums swelling, Doctor suggested full mouth laser gum surgery. I was very much scared for it but Doctor was friendly and knowledgeable, she reassured me, so I could trust her and was at ease to go for it. 
Post surgery follow ups were important and scheduled in timely manner. Covid protocols are still followed at the clinic and it is clean and hygienic. Assistant is well trained. 
At Dr. Priyanka's clinic, I feel at ease and I will always trust her to solve my dental problems.
Highly recommended to those having dental issues.
reply_text:

review:
My root canal treatment process was very smooth and pain-free. Dr. Priyanka is very friendly and explained everything in detail about the procedure in a very simple manner. She made me feel at ease and she works in a way where you don't feel any discomfort. 

She also treated my 81-year old grandmother for implamt infection.  The implants were done somewhere else and that dentist had given up and had said nothing can be done now. Dr. Priyanka came to the rescue and treated her with utmost care. The treatment of infected implant was done using Lasers.

The services are excellent and follow-ups are scheduled in a timely manner. The clinic is clean and hygienic. 

Most of my family members have been treated by Dr. Priyanka and all are more  than satisfied with her work. 
Highly recommend Dr. Shirodkar's Family Dental Care.
